results.title: The Plan
results.creator_credit: C Larry Roberts, Dianne Orr and Bescher Films
results.brief_description: Features Michele Meservy, Utah’s Young Mother of the Year for 1978. Follows this intelligent and committed Mormon Mother through the rigours of her day, taking care of her five young children and husband, and reflecting on her life, obligations and spiritual destiny.
results.creator_credit_for_label: C Larry Roberts, Dianne Orr and Bescher Films

results.title: The Pirogue maker
results.creator_credit: Arnold Eagle and Humble Oil and Refining Company
results.brief_description: The shaping of a small boat known as a pirogue, from a cypress tree trunk; an intriguing record of a fast-dying art by descendents of the Acadians who left Nova Scotia in 1755. Flaherty’s films “Louisiana story” led to the tracing of one of the few remaining pirogue makers, Hebron Allemand whose work was recorded with Acadian folk songs giving local background.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Arnold Eagle and Humble Oil and Refining Company

results.title: The Pipette
results.creator_credit: L.M. Simmons, Craig Baynes and Australian Teaching Films
results.brief_description: One of a series of instructional films demonstrating the use of chemical apparatus; correct method of using the pipette; cleaning and preparation; filling; adjustment of liquid level to measuring mark; discharging the pipette; washing and cleaning after use.

results.title: The Picture gallery
results.brief_description: Intrinsic in many great paintings is a sense of movement. Rather than seeming static, the figures appear to be caught in motion. A young Czech animator, Jan Trmal, has taken ten such paintings and by separating their elements has actually set them in motion for a brief time to the music of Gianfranco Maselli, Antonin Vranicky and Johann S. Bach.

results.title: The Picnic
results.brief_description: A small boy kept in after school finds a notice about a girls’ picnic and shows it to the boys who plan to gate crash. The girls realise this and prepare sandwiches with shoe nugget and drinks with paint. When the boys raid the lunch bags they receive a nasty shock.

results.title: The Phase contrast microscope [Silent]
results.creator_credit: G.G. Grand and B Troughton + Simms Ltd
results.brief_description: Explains the properties of light and image formation in a normal microscope, and the effect of the Zernike disc in transforming changes in wave phase into changes in amplitudes to phase-contrast microscope is shown in use, with some examples of images invisible by normal miscroscopy.
results.creator_credit_for_label: G.G. Grand and B Troughton + Simms Ltd

results.title: The Pedestrian strikes back
results.creator_credit: Jack L. Copeland, Copeland Productions and KNBC (Television station : Los Angeles, Calif.)
results.brief_description: Assesses the national trend of revitalising the downtown core of cities through the construction of malls, focusing upon Burbank’s Golden Mall, and comparing it with similar projects throughout California. Authorities analyse the need for malls and discuss the difficulties encountered in providing them.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jack L. Copeland, Copeland Productions and KNBC (Television station : Los Angeles, Calif.)

results.title: The Patched up fashion plate
results.brief_description: A girl (Linda Ingram) living in a battered timber house patches a pair of jeans. She walks among the second hand stores of Prahran and then the fashion boutiques of Toorak Road.

results.title: The Parting
results.brief_description: This film, in revealing some of the life and the ritual of death in this village in the Montenegro area of Yugoslavia, promotes examination of our own customs, of our own beliefs, and of those fears and hopes which the recognition of death awakens in each of us.
results.description: This film, in revealing some of the life and the ritual of death in this village in the Montenegro area of Yugoslavia, promotes examination of our own customs, of our own beliefs, and of those fears and hopes which the recognition of death awakens in each of us.

results.title: The Panda
results.creator_credit: Shanghai Scientific and Educational Film Studio
results.brief_description: The Panda is a survivor from ancient times and now is only found in the North of China. They were almost extinct, but the care by forest rangers and the people of China has assured their survival.
results.description: The Panda is a survivor from ancient times and now is only found in the North of China. They were almost extinct, but the care by forest rangers and the people of China has assured their survival.
